name: audioPlayer
description: component that allows users play audio files.

propSpec.name: value
propSpec.desc: The source where to get the audio from

propSpec.name: width
propSpec.desc: The width of the audio player

propSpec.name: height
propSpec.desc: The height of the audio player

propSpec.name: hasLabel
propSpec.desc: When true, the audio player will have a label

propSpec.name: controls
propSpec.desc: When true, the audio player will have controls

propSpec.name: autoPlay
propSpec.desc: When true, the audio player will auto play
